gw.api.validation

Class IFieldValidator

  • gw.api.validation.IFieldValidator

  • public class IFieldValidator
    Interface for implementing Gosu Field Validators.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFieldValidationResult validate(String modelValue, Object valueOwner, Map<K,V> parameters)
      Implement this method to validate an object for a designated datatype. Specify datatypes via entity metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        IFieldValidationResult validate(String modelValue,
                              Object valueOwner,
                              Map<K,V> parameters)
        Implement this method to validate an object for a designated datatype. Specify datatypes via entity metadata.
        Parameters:
        modelValue - Value to validate
        valueOwner - Owner of the value to provide contextual information
        parameters - A map of values used by the validator
        Returns:
        IFieldValidationResult
